techmeme.title: AWS launches App Studio in public preview, which is a generative AI-powered service allowing enterprise users to create internal apps using text prompts (Shubham Sharma/VentureBeat)
OpenAI and Los Alamos National Laboratory announce a partnership to evaluate how multimodal AI models can be used safely by scientists in laboratory settings (Evan Gorelick/Bloomberg)
Source: Apple aims to ship 90M+ iPhone 16 series devices in 2024, after shipping about 81M iPhone 15s in H2 2023, as it counts on AI services to boost demand (Bloomberg)
Germany agrees a compromise proposal to strip Huawei components from the 5G core mobile network by the end of 2026; sources say companies have until 2029 (Michael Nienaber/Bloomberg)
FTC source: Microsoft ditching its OpenAI board observer seat is unlikely to resolve concerns at the agency, which is conducting an antitrust review of AI deals (Foo Yun Chee/Reuters)
